title: Get up to 12 hours of run time on this refurbished MacBook Air — now on sale
content:
Macworld

Prices remain high despite the fact that inflation has eased. Looking for a new computer but need to stick to a budget? Then consider this refurbished Apple MacBook Air, offered with additional savings off our already discounted price. (Don’t worry, it’s significantly less expensive than the Vision Pro.)

The MacBook Air is an ideal computer for students, freelancers, professionals, or anyone else who requires something that travels easily. It’s got a powerful Core i5 processor, 4GB of RAM, and a 128GB SSD. Plus its battery will last up to 12 hours on a single charge, which means it’ll last the whole workday.

And since it’s refurbished, you can own a MacBook Air for way less than normal. It’s been professionally cleaned and tested to ensure that it works as if it were new from the factory. And while it’s possible there might be a minor cosmetic blemish or two on the case, these will not affect functionality.

Purchase this refurbished Apple MacBook Air for just $249.97, no coupon codes required, until 11:59 pm on June 18.
